statements.name: PROC MAPIMPORT
statements.description: Identifies the input Esri shapefile and converts this map into a SAS/GRAPH map data set.

statements.name: EXCLUDE
statements.description: Specifies one or more fields from the shapefile that are excluded from the output map data set.

statements.name: ID
statements.description: Reorders the map polygons by one or more identifier fields.

statements.name: RENAME
statements.description: Renames variables in the output map data set that correspond to specific fields in the shapefile.

statements.name: SELECT
statements.description: Selects the fields from the shapefile that are included in the output map data set.
